projects.title: Galaxy Fight
msg: A round based 2D strategy game with 3D PvP fights.
Its basically a collection of my C++ skills. Including Templates,Boost, QT, OpenGL and SDL.

projects.title: Pacmap
msg: Want to play Pacman in your home town streets? Want to compete with your friends?
Than play Pacmap. Its an multiplayer Pacman on street maps.

projects.title: Beeblebrox CTF
msg: A VM for IT-Sec starters to learn Unix and find common IT Security flaws.
It includes Bash-Scripting, Web-Scraping and manipulation of Web-Authentication.

scrap.title: PYTHON
scrap.msg: 2 years data mining and manipulation. Also use of AI algorithms, PyGame and general scripting with Python 3.

scrap.title: WEB
scrap.msg: Fluid with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript. NodeJS backend and frontend projects using express, OAS and VUE.JS. I can to create REST APIs and responsive website with bootstrab.

scrap.title: C/C++
scrap.msg: 1 1/2 years developing algorithms, OpenGL vertices and GUI elements using QT

scrap.title: JAVA
scrap.msg: 3 years of object oriented programming, multimedia tools, datatypes and software-engineering concepts.
